mapper.select: select count(*) from (select * from internal_approval WHERE unix_timestamp( creat_time ) between unix_timestamp( DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL dayofyear(now())-1 DAY)) and unix_timestamp( SYSDATE()) GROUP BY project_id) as a
